publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-598 Mr Frank McAveety: The Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector Committee in consideration of The Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-598 Mr Frank McAveety: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector Committee in consideration of the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-598 Mr Frank McAveety: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector Committee in consideration of the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-598 Mr Frank McAveety: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector Committee in consideration of the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.
